channel.title: (Delphi 7) Little question: how do i create an URL? - NVM i've got it :P
channel.description:
Ty freddy1990: [quote="Freddy1990"][Code]ShellExecute(Handle, nil, 'http://www.somesite.com', nil, nil, SW_SHOWNORMAL);[/code]
uses: ShellAPI[/quote]
